description: This Java class 'NetworkDisableJoinRequest' is part of a mock Zigbee core request handling package. It extends a base 'Request' class and implements an 'execute' method to send a response and disable join functionality in a mocked Zigbee network environment.

classes.name: NetworkDisableJoinRequest
classes.description: A request class that disables network join feature in a mock Zigbee network by sending an appropriate response and invoking the core's enableJoin method with -1.

methods.name: NetworkDisableJoinRequest
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with a specified request ID.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Performs the action of sending a response and disabling network join in the mock Zigbee core.
